description:
Public Provident Fund or PPF is one of the most popular investment avenues used by Indians to save and grow their money for retirement. Afterall, the money invested is guaranteed by the Government of India, there are tax benefits and the gains one makes on it are tax-free. In this video, we shall summarize the many features of the PPF account and uncover some additional details that investors may find useful
